javelin.controller.action.ai

Interface AiAction

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractAttack, AiMovement, Breath, CastSpell, Charge, DefensiveAttack, Feint, ForceWait, Grapple, Maneuver, MeleeAttack, RangedAttack, TouchAttack, Trip, Wait

    public interface AiAction
    Implement this if you want ActionProvider to use your Action as a possible AI move.
